original_title: Cowgirls: Portraits of American Ranch Women
overview: The cowgirls in this documentary are modern-day women aged six to sixty, who ride, rope and tough out the elements just as well as their more famous cowboy counterparts. The film spans three generations, telling the inspirational real-life stories of women who are living their own "dream-come-true" existences.
title: Cowgirls: Portraits of American Ranch Women
